General.Name: Bespoke Extracts Inc
General.Description: Bespoke Extracts, Inc. provides hemp-derived cannabidiol (CBD) products. The company offers CBD formulations, including manuka honey and in the form of lotions and balms. It offers its products through its direct to consumers e-commerce store bespokeextracts.com. The company was formerly known as DiMi Telematics International, Inc. and changed its name to Bespoke Extracts, Inc. in March 2017. Bespoke Extracts, Inc. is headquartered in Aurora, Colorado.
General.Address: 2590 Walnut Street, Denver, CO, United States, 80205
